entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
